frequentlyAsked.title: Frequently Asked Questions
frequentlyAsked.description: Quick answers to your most common questions about using InstaPure.

q1.content: Yes! InstaPure is completely free to use. We don’t charge fees or ask for payment info.

q2.trigger: Do I need an account to use it?
q2.content: Not at all. Just paste the Instagram URL and start downloading. No registration needed.

q3.trigger: Is it legal to download videos?
q3.content: Our tool is for personal use only. Always respect content ownership and copyright laws.

q1.trigger: What Instagram content types are supported?
q1.content: You can download public posts, reels, and IGTV videos. Stories and highlights are not currently supported.

q2.trigger: How good is the video quality?
q2.content: We deliver the highest available resolution—usually HD (1080p)—based on the original content.

q3.trigger: Can I use it on mobile?
q3.content: Yes! InstaPure works seamlessly on phones, tablets, and desktops alike.
